channel.title: █ how do i run another server? █
channel.description: Ok, this is different than the title. I'm running one server and my brother wants to run on. So we tried making his ports 5555 and my port 43594. We tried to use the same IP but just a different port. It won't work however, people cant connect to the 5555 port just the 43594 port..

item.title: █ how do i run another server? █
item.dc:creator: @the_reaper77 the reaper77
item.description:
@the_reaper77 wrote:

try what mylust says, and you can have 2 servers online with the same name only if they are different ports.

Read full topic
item.source: █ how do i run another server? █

item.title: █ how do i run another server? █
item.dc:creator: @mylust4blood mylust4blood
item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

open server.java and search 43594 and you will get this “43594 = default 43594” or w/e change the one before default not the one after

Read full topic
item.source: █ how do i run another server? █

item.title: █ how do i run another server? █
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

oooooh ok
uhm hhm…
i dont think thats possible because if they have the same name its only going to access one server
since no-ip doesnt connect with your computers ip address it connects to your routers ip address

for example
someone try’s to go to your server ____.no-ip.
or whatever your server name is
it will go to whatever server was running first
because if they type your server name in that gets the files and whatnot from your router which gets them from your computer
and if they tried it on port 5555 the router looks for your server name and finds it for the 43954 one and trys to connect but it fails therefor not letting it connect
so they cant be the same name if they are different names it should work fine if you know what your doing

Read full topic
item.source: █ how do i run another server? █

What do you mean you cant have the same name? I want to run the other server on 5555 from my brother’s computer.

item.title: █ how do i run another server? █
item.dc:creator: @Rufio Rufio
item.description:
@Rufio wrote:

you cant make them have the same name
and i suggest not running 2 from one computer unless u have a really really fast computer
